description:
The Next-Gen Collaboration Suite

Lark is a next-generation office suite that integrates messaging, schedule management, collaborative documents, video conferencing, and many more applications in a single platform.
Docs
- Users with edit permission for a document can now enter suggestion mode to propose revisions to the content. This feature facilitates proofreading and collaboration, allowing collaborators to accept or reject changes.
Settings
- You can now view an updated list of supported shortcuts in the Lark desktop app and customize them as needed.
